name: Sport Copter
about: Sport Copter International, based in Scappoose, Oregon, is a second-generation family business established in 1958, specializing in building the world's finest gyroplanes. Led by Jim Vanek, a renowned test pilot, airshow performer, and chief designer, the company is a leader in rotorcraft design, quality, performance, and safety. Sport Copter offers custom design, sales of kits and parts, and comprehensive service for all models. They provide FAA-accredited flight training from Sport Pilot to rotorcraft ratings, with experienced instructors and an FAA Designated Examiner. The company is committed to innovation, aiming to develop future gyroplanes with advanced technologies such as electric power and ion propulsion. With a strong focus on safety and education, Sport Copter is a premier choice for gyroplane training and expertise.
services:
["Flight Instructor CFI
Ground School
Flight Instructor CFI
Sport Pilot
